body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**: bug

/kind bug


**What happened**: `kubectl get pvc` returns the following:
```
NAME       STATUS    CAPACITY    ACCESS MODES   STORAGECLASS   AGE
myclaim    Bound     pv-gcepd2   5Gi            ROX            slow      35m
myclaim2   Bound     pv-gcepd    5Gi            ROX            slow      25m
```
VOLUME label is missing.

**What you expected to happen**:
```
NAME       STATUS    VOLUME      CAPACITY       ACCESS MODES   STORAGECLASS   AGE
myclaim    Bound     pv-gcepd2   5Gi            ROX            slow           35m
myclaim2   Bound     pv-gcepd    5Gi            ROX            slow           25m
```
**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8+", GitVersion:"v1.8.0-alpha.0.3928+7116f522eeee5c-dirty", GitCommit:"7116f522eeee5cf866c9b60de32bcecc6e74763b", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2017-08-18T01:09:23Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

/sig cli

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG CLI.
labels.name: sig/cli

title: 'kubectl get pvc' missing PV name label.
